alt: PDB entry 1l7c coloured by chemically distinct molecules, side view.
description:
Homo-dimeric assembly 4 of PDB entry 1l7c coloured by chemically distinct molecules, side view. This structure contains:
  • 2 copies of Catenin alpha-1;
  • 1 copy of water.
clean_description: Homo-dimeric assembly 4 of PDB entry 1l7c coloured by chemically distinct molecules, side view. This structure contains: 2 copies of Catenin alpha-1; 1 copy of water.
